Html: It would be great if there's WOL feature w/ scheduling on this app. :)

WPP is mostly a application to publish package into Wsus. The feature you request, should be part of an application to push softwares to computers.
To add scheduling to WPP, I would have to rebuild WPP as a service.
Is there any WOL functionality currently in WPP?
No, as I said, this is not the goal of WPP.
There is a great WOL utility called Wake on LAN by AquilaTech http://www.aquilatech.com It is a great complement to Wsus Package Publisher.
